resources.string: This application was created to fulfill an assignment for our Software Engineering Design and Development course. After learning the Kotlin programming language and the functionalities of Android Studio, the students were required to apply their knowledge and develop an application of their choice.
A recipe application called Make Meals. Make Meals allows it\'s users to save, edit, search, and share recipes.
App by Omar Rosario and Michael Ruocco
Save and edit their prep and cook times, ingredients, and instructions
Search recipes by description of the kind meal they want
Change the application\'s theme to dark mode
Make Meals was developed by Michael Ruocco and Omar Rosario

string.name: disclosure
string.i: This application is not intended for commercial use
